channel.title: Buy and sell newsletters online
channel.description: Hi! We are building [LetterXchange.com](http://LetterXchange.com). LetterXchange is the online platform for buying and selling newsletter businesses. We firmly believe in the thriving community of newsletter entrepreneurs. Hence we are building LetterXchange to facilitate market discovery and secure transactions. We've just opened our community section, check out commuinty newsletters for sale at https://letterxchange.com/community.
